channel.title: Homework on Data Science for Biotechnology
channel.description: Recent content in Homework on Data Science for Biotechnology

item.title: Week 1
item.description: Week 1: Required: Create a Github account and email us your username (we will add you to our DS4B organization on GitHub) Once you are added to the GitHub DS4B organization, create a new repository (within the organization) for your DS4B coursework. Name it <first name>-<last name>. Click the “Add a README file” button when initializing the repo. Make the repository private. Clone the repository on your local machine.
